{"id":672460116,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1648928599,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"62 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/672460116/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome II","memory":"19.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool validpal(string &s,int low,int high,int count)\n    {\n        if(count>1)\n            return false;\n        while(low<high)\n        {\n            if(s[low]==s[high])\n            {\n                low++;\n                high--;\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                return validpal(s,low+1,high,count+1) || validpal(s,low,high-1,count+1);\n            }\n            \n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    bool validPalindrome(string s) {\n        int low=0,high=s.size()-1;\n        return validpal(s,low,high,0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
